# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in this project, please report it responsibly.

- Do **not** open a public GitHub issue.
- Email details to: vijayshikhare@gmail.com (or your secure contact).

Include:
- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact

We will acknowledge receipt within 48 hours and work to address valid reports promptly.

## Supported Versions

This is a static website with no backend or user data. Security updates (e.g., dependency fixes for fonts/icons) are applied as needed on the `main` branch.

Thank you for helping keep AppDost secure!
